job.body:
Total vacancies:83

Name of the Vacancies:

  • State Engineering Service Exam 2021

Description

Latest Central Government Jobs for Engineers have been published by Chhattisgarh Public Service Commission for State Engineering Service Exam 2021 in Chhattisgarh. If you are searching for a government job in Chhattisgarh then it is an opportunity for you. You can fill the online application for the vacancies of State Engineering Service Exam 2021, from 17-08-2021, and till 17-08-2021. If you are interested in all these vacancies in Chhattisgarh and if eligible, please check out the details given below, which have been given age limit, educational qualification pay scale, etc.

Application fee:

  • The mode of application is Online
  • The application fee for SC/ ST/ OBC Candidates of Chhattisgarh is only Rs. 300/-
  • The application fee for Other candidates out of Chhattisgarh is only Rs. 400/-

Educational qualification:

  • To apply for a State Engineering Service Exam 2021 in CGPSC, your Degree in Civil/ Mechanical/ Electrical Engineering must be completed from a recognized University

Important dates:

  •  The starting date to apply in these posts is 17-08-2021 
  •  The last date to apply in these posts is 15-09-2021 

Age Limit Criteria:

  • For General Candidate, you should be between 21 to 35 years old. 

CGPSC State Engineering Service Exam 2021 Pay Scale:

  • According to the information given by the Central Government and as per the 7th pay commission, the teacher's monthly salary is as per norms

How to apply for CGPSC State Engineering Service Asst. Engineer Recruitment 2021?

Press the Apply Now button above. You can directly and easily start the application process for the State Engineering Service Exam 2021. Fill in your details and submit it or follow all the steps given below.

  •  First, go to the official website of CGPSC and register yourself on the portal.
  • Find the notification, log in and then provide the details and documents asked by CGPSC
  • Then save it and complete the application submission.
  • Then to fully complete the process you have to submit the application fee.
  • And finally, download the application form for future purposes.
